DOC.brief_summary: This research seek examine psychological factor may impact relationship incentive health behavior engagement , specifically fruit vegetable consumption . Additionally , compare impact two different incentive schedule behavior engagement , one provide immediate reward ( i.e . reward receive daily basis ) another provide delay reward ( i.e . reward receive end study period ) , control condition reward offer . Study participant provide report fruit vegetable consumption day three week , two incentive condition , receive small monetary reward fruit vegetable consumption . Following three week report reward period , participant complete two additional assessment , measure psychological construct behavior engagement follow cessation reward .
DOC.criteria: Consume few 5 servings/day fruit vegetable Daily access internet 3 week follow baseline session Have willing create account PayPal
